biotools.summary:
Prediction of disease-causing and neutral mutations in human transmembrane proteins.

Transmembrane proteins (TMPs) act as a gate to the interior of the cells.

A tool to discriminate the disease-causing and neutral mutations of membrane proteins.

We have used 4 different type of datasets for developing the classification models and these datasets are available in the follwoing link
